guidanceItem.title: Web sites are located on a non-system partition.
guidanceItem.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that the web sites are not located in the default \inetpub\wwwroot directory. It should be on a non-system partition.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
